title: Foxworth Friday: Aaron Rodgers is 'immunized', also Odell vs. the Browns
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth get into the discovery that Green Bay QB Aaron Rodgers has not been vaccinated against COVID-19 following his positive test, which is causing him to miss at least this weekend’s matchup with Kansas City (1:20). Plus, the Odell Beckham Jr. situation in Cleveland and just how badly they have misused their star receiver (23:04).
